item.title: @elonmusk: Watching 2009 Elon Musk on Charlie Rose casually drop one of the clearest explanations ever about su...
item.description: Watching 2009 Elon Musk on Charlie Rose casually drop one of the clearest explanations ever about suborbital vs orbital flight: Suborbital (Virgin/Blue Origin style tourism flights): â†’ Top speed ~ Mach 3 â†’ Roughly 9 units of energy Orbital (real orbit, what SpaceX does): â†’ Needs ~ Mach 25 â†’ Roughly 625 units of energy Why? Energy scales with velocity squared â†’ orbital takes ~70Ã— more energy! Suborbital is basically just ~1.5% of the effort needed to actually reach & stay in orbit. He was already explaining this 16 years ago like it was nothing.

item.description: xAI added their new image generation model (grok-imagine-image-pro) to the API, so I had Grok build a simple webpage that lets you generate images from a text prompt. Here's what it looks like in action ğŸ‘‡ All you need is an xAI API key: â†’ Go toconsole.x.aiâ†’ Sign in / create an account â†’ Add credits under billing â†’ Generate an API key Open the link below, hit the preview button on the code to render the webpage inside Grok. Paste your key in, type a prompt, hit generate. That's it.grok.com/share/bGVnYWN5_493bâ€¦

item.title: @elonmusk: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Rotherham: An 11-year-old girl who previously reported she was sexually abused was found in a der...
item.description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Rotherham: An 11-year-old girl who previously reported she was sexually abused was found in a derelict house with another girl and a group of adult males. She was arrested for drunken disorderly, and none of the males were arrested. Police officers dismissed a case where a 12-year-old girl was having sex with five Asian males as quote "100% consensual in every incident". Fathers have tracked down their daughters and tried to remove them from the houses where they were being abused only to find themselves arrested when police arrived to the scene. Home Affairs Committee 09 Sep 2014. Crompton retired with a Â£2m pension in 2016.
